Class BookClub

java.lang.Object
  BookClub

public class BookClub
extends java.lang.Object

Class describing the client data and behaviours of a book club for its rewards program

Version:
1.0 Oct 6, 2016
Author:
Vinay Punwani

Method Detail

calculateBookPoints

public int calculateBookPoints()
Method calculateBookPoints which calculates the reward points for a member of the book club based on their number of purchased books per month.

Returns:
the calculated total amount of reward points for a specific member
